ComicInfo.Summary: Witness the birth of the most important super hero team ever in the universe-spanning event that will rock the month of March! Wade Wilson has been trapped to save the universe, and to do that he's gonna need help. Enter: The sexy-but-insecure Lady Deadpool! The devious-but-lovable Headpool (a.k.a. the zombie Deadpool head)! The bratty-but-brilliant Kidpool! And the irascible mutt known as Dogpool! Individually, they're, well, kind of messed up, but together, they're the unstoppable force known as DPC Summary Back in the Earth 616, a couple pirates found Headpool in a boat. So the pirates took him to Goat Skull island. The pirates then gave Headpool to a mad scientist/hunter. Meanwhile Earth 616 Deadpool teleported onto the island wondering why he's back in his universe until he's attacked by Pirates. Deadpool easily killed all the pirates. The mad scientist then left with the last pirate who thinks Headpool is a ghost coming to haunt him. Headpool then scared the pirate into putting on a helicopter beanie on Headpool. The mad Scientist shot Deadpool in the head, once the Mad scientist came closer to him Deadpool got up and asked where Headpool is. once the Scientist/hunter gave him the information Deadpool snapped his neck. After having sex with the scientists daughter, Deadpool reunited with Headpool and headed back to Deadpool's apartment.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 18:20:15. [CVDB201803]
ComicInfo.Editor: Axel Alonso, Joe Quesada, Sebastian Girner
ComicInfo.Characters: Deadpool, Dogpool, Kidpool, Lady Deadpool, Zombie Deadpool
